subcategories.title: What is Management?
paragraphs: Management is the process of planning, organizing, and controlling resources.
It includes tasks like decision-making and problem-solving.

subcategories.title: Organizational Behaviour
paragraphs: This studies how people interact within groups.
Motivation, leadership, team dynamics are key areas.

title: Ethics at the Workplace & Corporate Governance

subcategories.title: Workplace Ethics
paragraphs: Ethics guide acceptable behavior in professional settings.
Common ethics include integrity, honesty, and respect for others.

subcategories.title: Corporate Governance
paragraphs: Corporate Governance ensures accountability in business practices.
Board of Directors play a key role in oversight and transparency.

subcategories.title: Verbal Communication
paragraphs: Verbal communication includes spoken and written messages.
Clarity, tone, and choice of words matter.

subcategories.title: Non-verbal Communication
paragraphs: Body language, facial expressions, and gestures convey messages.
Listening is also a key part of communication.
